attributes.action: Call a halt now to spending money this country cannot afford to host 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becomming increasingly obvious the cost of hosting the 2012 Olympic Games is escallating out of control. We simply cannot afford to spend the billions that are being swallowed up, so lets stop it now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
